Class ValidationException

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValidationExceptionImpl

    public abstract class ValidationException
extends VertxException
    This is the main class for every Validation flow related errors

    Francesco Guardiani @slinkydeveloper

        public String keyword()
        Returns:
        the keyword that failed the validation, if any

public JsonPointer scope()
        Deprecated. use schema() and then Schema.getScope() instead
        Returns:
        the scope of the schema that failed the validation

      • inputScope
